subject: Photography
title: Environmental Portraits
description: A quick win: understand Environmental Portraits.

hook.text: A chef in the kitchen. A mechanic under a car. Environmental portraits place people in their world.

buildup.text: Unlike studio portraits, environmental portraits include the subject's surroundings as part of the story.

discovery.text: The setting provides context â€” occupation, lifestyle, personality â€” without a single word of explanation.

twist.text: The challenge is balancing subject and environment. Too much background steals attention. Too little loses context.

climax.text: Arnold Newman pioneered this genre. His portrait of Stravinsky at a piano is a masterclass in environment as story.

punchline.text: Show someone's world and you've told their story.

quiz.question: What defines an environmental portrait?
options: The subject is photographed in their natural setting or workspace
